content.text: The pocketbook includes important formulas of mathematics, physics, chemistry and basics of technology as well as basics of optoelectronics, communication technology and computer science. Often used material values, constants and conversions of units as well as the properties of the chemical elements are compiled in tables to ensure quick access. In the processing for the current 4th edition, the field of chemistry was especially renewed and expanded to meet the requirements of interdisciplinary basic knowledge even better. This work summarizes mathematical, physical and technical formulas in a bank. Compact and handy are the essential connections explained and illustrated in overviews and many pictures. Frequently used constants, material values and formulas are compiled in tables. This pocketbook is an indispensable help for engineers and natural scientists in study and profession.
content.title_en: Pocketbook of Mathematics and Physics

metadata.authors: Hering, Ekbert; Martin, Rolf; Stohrer, Martin

content.text: MediaPhotography - analog and digital : terms, techniques, web. Digital photography is always understood in current literature as DIGITAL photography. This book consciously tries to lead to a better understanding of modern photography by combining classical with digital technology, for example, to simulate depth of field or to correct typical - analog and digital - image errors, just as the present-day "discovery" of the classic darkroom techniques in digital image processing is in focus. In addition, special aspects of digital photography such as noise and dust correction, copyright issues and the possibilities of the "digital negative" of a raw file are presented. In this context, professional software such as Phase One as open source software such as gimp 2 is depicted. TOC:Preface.- History of photography.- Physical and chemical foundations.- Contrast control in analogue photography.- Basics of digital photography.- Digital image processing.- Black and white with digital index. The digital- Ink.
content.title_en: MediaPhotography - analog and digital : terms, techniques, web

content.text: The basics of the classic TRIZ: A practical textbook of inventive thinking for engineers. Every person is an inventor! The author presents in this book the development and results of the TRIZ method for solving inventive tasks. TRIZ has its origins in the former USSR and accumulates the experience in the development of many thousand inventions from the patent portfolio of the whole world. The reader is presented in a vivid form the key ideas, methods and examples of TRIZ method. Thus, he gets the opportunity to acquire the main instruments of TRIZ itself. The second edition has been extended by numerous examples. TOC:Introduction.- Methods of Inventing.- A-Studio: algorithmic navigation of thinking.- Classical navigators of inventing the A-Studio.- Strategy of Inventing.- Tactics of Inventing.- Invention Art.- Development of TRIZ.- Final words.- Installations: Catalogues of Navigators of Inventing in the A-Studio. (Each chapter completes with an internship part.)
content.title_en: Basics of the classic TRIZ : A practical textbook of inventive thinking for engineers

content.text: Machine tooling 3 : Mechatronic systems, feed drives, process diagnostics. The book is aimed at both students and users who need a comprehensive overview of existing systems when selecting suitable machines. The sixth edition has been reworked and improved with regard to the graphic presentation. It presents the latest developments around the regulated feed drive in all areas of application. The compendium machine tooling systems include five volumes that bundle the increasingly complex matter of machine tooling. The focus of Volume 3 is on the design of mechatronic components, in particular the feed drives used for the generation of highly dynamic drive movements of machine tools. Feed drives are among the main components of machine tooling machines to which high demands are placed regarding their dynamic properties. Large accelerations and speeds are required with low web deviations at the same time. Design aids are presented in the selection and design of important machine components. A focus is on the mechanical and control engineering design of feed drives with direct and conventional drives, and the measurement systems required for positioning.
content.title_en: Machine tools 3 : Mechatronic systems, feed drives, process diagnostics

content.text: Practical information technology with C# : Applications and basics ; with 18 tables. Scientific computing, computational intelligence and computational engineering are central methods of modern information technology. Behind these terms are different concepts of digital information processing, which are used e.g. in the analysis of measurement value series, the simulation of electrical balancing processes or in automatic writing recognition. The author gives a sound presentation of the theoretical foundations and the software technical implementation of these methods using concrete code examples in C#.
content.title_en: Practical information technology with C# : Applications and basics ; with 18 tables

content.text: CNC Crash Course. Publisher's text: This book addresses readers who want to deal fundamentally with the topic of CNC technology. The thematic elaboration of this book is designed in this way, so that CNC beginners are also well addressed. This book is accompanied by a CD-ROM which is useful in the development of the individual NC programs (Betr.-System: Windows XP. The runtime of this software covers 60 days from the installation date. All course examples developed in this book are based on this software and lead the learner systematically up to a specified level of performance.
content.title_en: CNC crash course

content.text: Measurements are the everyday bread for everyone who is involved in electronics and electrical engineering, both in the profession and in the hobby. The well-known author explains after some basic information and terms some simple and frequently occurring measuring instruments and measurements, afterwards even more special measuring instruments as well as devices in the field of electrical engineering (especially installation technology). The texts are very well understandable and vivid (with many illustrations). The purchase can be recommended everywhere, especially since such a practical book for such a large reader circle has not been published for a long time. (1) Basic information and terms, simple, frequently occurring measuring instruments and measurements, more special measuring instruments and devices from the electrical industry; for electronics and electricians in the profession and hobby. (Rita Weinheimer-Hartmann)
content.title_en: Measurement technology in practice

content.text: Who is who in the world of Jesus?. Short portraits of numerous persons from the Jewish and Roman worlds of the 1st century AD who play a role in the history of Jesus' effect.
content.title_en: Who is who in the world of Jesus?

content.text: The Internet - Education - Community. Information technologies, especially the Internet, are becoming increasingly important for people's lives and working environments. Whether it is about learning and playing or maintaining social relationships, the new media are an integral part of this. The volume takes stock of some of these areas and asks how our lives will change as a result of the growing presence of the Internet.
content.title_en: Internet - Education - Community

content.text: Ingenious women: famous inventors from Melitta Bentz to Maria Curie. Everyone now knows that women as well as men can invent machines and other useful things and that this was not easy for them in the past due to the social obstacles. The author presents here, based mainly on extensive patent research, in rapid succession a wide range of inventions and ideas that come from women. The large number of inventors comes from Great Britain, also the described period is limited to the period from 1637 to 1914. Furthermore, as the German subtitles associate, it is not only about technical achievements such as dishwashers, corset constructions, fold-up fins or the coffee filter invented by Melitta Bentz, but also about creative entrepreneurs such as Margarethe Steiff, new concepts in the field of education as with Maria Montessori, scientific discoveries such as with Marie Curie or pacifistic ideas like with Bertha von Suttner. Informative is a chronological list of women who have been acquired. (3) Interestingly acquired patents.
content.title_en: Genial women: famous inventors from Melitta Bentz to Maria Curie

content.text: Made in Germany : best of contemporary architecture. Klappentext: Inovativ, unconventional and with a critical view, the band documents the exciting diversity of contemporary architecture in and from Germany. A high-profile jury of professional journalists and creative observers from the worldwide architecture scene has selected and evaluated outstanding Bauwerrke, which are presented and commented on here using texts, photos, floor plans and plans. The best architects are still presented; short interviews, essays and a special on concrete as material of the year round off the concept of "Made in Germany - Best of Contemporary Architecture" as a new voice of architectural criticism. Categories among others: Bauwerk des Jahres – 1. Platz: Jewish Centre in Munich (Wandel Hoefer Lorch) German architects abroad - 1. Platz: Terrence Donnelly Center in Toronto (Behnish Architects) Foreign architects in Germany - 1. Platz: Mercedes-Benz Museum in Stuttgart (UNStudio) Freiraumplanung - 1. Platz: Jungferstieg in Hamburg (WES & Partner) Architects of the Year - Ragnarly Center in Toronto (Behnish Architects)
content.title_en: Made in Germany : best of contemporary architecture

content.text: Metzler-Lexikon literary symbols. The novel lexicon, which is useful for text interpretation, shows important literary symbols in German literary history and their respective horizons of meaning. (Ronald Schneider) A symbol lexicon on German literary history is a novelty, and this with good reason, because the variety of literary symbol references is almost infinite. Nevertheless, there is a basic set of symbols, often used throughout the centuries, with a historically limited horizon of meaning, from the "evening" as "symbol of age and death", but also the "threat and limitation" to the "cypress" as "symbol of mourning, death and immortality". In this respect, such a lexicon - with all its incompleteness in principle - makes sense and offers valuable orientation aids, especially for text interpretation. For every larger stock of reference works and means of information on (especially German) literature science highly recommended. (2 A)
content.title_en: Metzler-Lexikon literary symbols

content.text: Where is it going to God? asked the little piglet : a book for all those who are not fooled. The little piglet and the little hedgehog had always believed that they could not go any better. But then someone sticks a poster to her house overnight, on which it is written: "Who does not know God, something is missing!" So they set out to look for God... Where does it go to God?, asked the little piglet humorously to clarify the three world religions Judaism, Christianity and Islam. The question whether a non-religion child "something is missing" is answered from the perspective of worldly humanism: "And the moral of the story: Who does not know God, does not need him..."
content.title_en: Where is God going? asked the little piglet : a book for all who are not fooled

content.text: Urban Living: History, Urban Design, Perspectives. Urban Living is again in conversation IBM architects, planners and investors promote new and latest urban housing types and town houses: >>Townhouses<<, stacked duplex flats, city villas, high-rise apartments, lofts and more. Often it is overlooked that we can look back on a long tradition of demanding urban housing. For the first time IBM has presented an interdisciplinary team with regard to Germany, but also to the most important developments in European abroad IBM a comprehensive history of this upscale urban living extending to the 16th century. The study of urban building qualities and the history of the use of the housing types provides the basis for the current discussion about >>new< qualities of urban living historically and gives it fresh impetus. A research project of the Desert Red Foundation.
content.title_en: City Living : History, Town Planning, Perspectives

content.text: The book provides the technical and design basic knowledge on the topic of plan and representation. The project-related presentation in the new building and inventory, which requires a targeted, scale-dependent selection of information, is conveyed with concrete examples from architectural history and present. Thus, the reader learns that in the age of CAD historical examples of architectural representation are still inspiring and instructive publishing text: The book conveys the technical and design basic knowledge on the topic of plan and representation. The project-related presentation in the new building and inventory, which requires a targeted, scale-based selection of information, is conveyed with concrete examples from architectural history and present. Thus, the reader also learns that in the age of CAD historical examples of architectural representation are still inspiring and instructive.
content.title_en: Architecture and plan presentation

content.text: The "original version" of this very solidly informative dictionary on the entire range of topics of information technology was published in 1985, and several changes in titles and publishers survived, in order to be published for the first time at Springer-Verlag and for the second time under the current title. Hard to understand is the title of the publication, since the direct predecessor (BA 5/04) still operated as a 6th edition. In the data pool of the DB, however, one gets actually 13 hits, if one researches the author together with the keyword "Lexikon". The narrow definitions of about 5,000 keywords were continuously updated, which with each new edition was new emphasis this time in the field of data security. Overall, the dictionary is still rather slowly outdated due to its basic way of presenting itself as a computer lexicon. Changes in the scope are difficult to estimate, since the layout has been completely changed. The 5th edition (BA 10/02) and older ones should now be definitively patterned. (2 A/M: Zimmermann)
content.title_en: Lexicon of Computer Science

content.text: Europe's urban system between metropolitanisation and globalisation: profiles and development paths of the metropolitan regions of Europe in structural transformation to a knowledge-intensive economy. The EU economic area is today characterised by a "metropolization" of the economic development and innovation potential, i.e. the selective concentration of knowledge-intensive economic activities in the metropolitan regions and metropolitan areas of Europe. At the same time, the metropolitan areas act as the main hubs of the global economic integration of Europe. In this book, the different sectoral profiles and development paths of the metropolitan regions and metropolitan areas of Europe are worked out in structural transformation to the knowledge-intensive economy. It is shown that services are by no means the sole determining component of this structural change and research-intensive industries are an equally significant part of this process.
content.title_en: Europe's urban system between metropolitanisation and globalisation: profiles and development paths of Europe's metropolitan regions in structural change to a knowledge-intensive economy

content.text: Transport infrastructure construction works: hydraulic binders and mainly mineral building materials; standards. Contains: DIN 1164-10:2004 ; DIN 1164-10:2005 [rectification 1] ; DIN 4226-100:2002 ; DIN 4301:1981 ; DIN 18506:2002 ; DIN EN 197-1:2004 [rectification 1] ; DIN EN 197-1:2004 ; DIN EN 197-2:2000 ; DIN EN 197-4:2004 ; DIN EN 206-1:2001 ; DIN EN 206-1:2004 [A1] ; DIN EN 206-1:2005 [A2] ; DIN EN 450-1:2005 ; DIN EN 450-2:2005 ; DIN EN 12620:2003 ; DIN EN 12620:2004 [rectification 1] ; DIN EN 13043:2002 ; DIN EN 13043:2004 [rectification 1] ; DIN EN 13055-1:2002 ; DIN EN 13055-1:2004 [rectification 1] ; DIN EN 14227-2:2004 ; DIN EN 13055-2:2004 ; DIN EN 13242:2003 ; DIN EN 13242:2004 [rectification 1] ; DIN EN 13285:2003 ; DIN EN 14227-2:2004 EN 14227
content.title_en: Transport infrastructure construction work : hydraulic binders and mainly mineral building materials ; standards

content.text: Statistics with Excel : descriptive statistics for everyone; [Excel 2003 and annex to Excel 2007]. Elementary and easy to understand introduction to the methods of descriptive statistics with EXCEL 2003.
content.title_en: Statistics with Excel : descriptive statistics for everyone ; [Excel 2003 and annex to Excel 2007]

content.text: Get started right: Learn programming with Visual Basic 2008: [everything that beginners need: no previous knowledge required; lots of exercises and tips, software for immediate departure]. This book is aimed at beginners without extensive programming knowledge. It replaces the predecessor edition for Visual Basic 2005 (unfortunately not discussed). The new edition is due to the further development of the .NET framework, the new version of the integrated development environment Express Edition and the new operating system Vista. As Vista is only slowly asserting itself against the previous version Windows XP, books on Visual Basic 2005 such as P. Monadjemi (BA 4/07) should remain in existence. Structure and structure largely correspond to the parallel work of the two authors to Visual C [sharp] 2008 (K. Flagstick: BA 4/08). This also explains the frequently detectable text identities and the similarity/identity of examples and exercises. Focus on the principles of object-oriented programming and Windows form applications (graphic user interfaces). Database accesses are treated shorter. Many detailed examples. Exercises (with solutions to the book's own website).
content.title_en: Get started right: Learn to program with Visual Basic 2008 : [everything that beginners need: no previous knowledge required; lots of exercises and tips, software for immediate start]

content.text: Textiles today: a global overview. What are textiles used for in the 21st century? This theme is dedicated to the present title. Looking through you will experience some surprises. This is how you learn about the clothing of motorcyclists, astronauts or medical textiles. In addition, you will learn about the connection between architecture and textiles, the most diverse patterns on textiles and on textile art. Not to forget the products that are currently being explored, such as protective clothing against bullets or special clothing for robots. A very informative and exciting title that offers a deep insight into the processing and use of textiles of all kinds. However, this happens at a scientific level, so that the beautifully made picture book is more aimed at students or professionals. Where these clients are present, the band is certainly a great profit for the stock. (3)
content.title_en: Textiles Today : a Global Overview

content.text: Protection by DIN VDE 0100 : textbook on the learning fields of electrical installations, electrical energy supply and safety of equipment. Comment on important regulations; for practitioners to look up, for trainees with repeat questions, for exam preparation and also for DIY enthusiasts. (LK/W: Weinheimer-Hartmann) It is still the "most recommendable comment" for (future) craftsmen, even for hobbyists; he explains only a selection of the most important standards, but this is all the more detailed. He serves as a reference work as well as a textbook, since he contains questions about repetition and deepening. Since 2003 the electrical professions have been reclassified (in learning fields) and since the learning field "electric installation and energy supply ..." now appears in all professional sectors, this book had to be expanded accordingly. Moreover, everything has been revised, both in terms of the updated standards and on the didactic preparation. The headings are now also English-language. After possibility, especially from this comment, the latest edition should be available anyway, now due to the 11th edition, now also used for all changes.
content.title_en: Protection by DIN VDE 0100 : Textbook on the learning fields Electrical installations, electrical energy supply and safety of equipment

content.text: The global countdown: Justice or self-destruction - the future of globalization. The global countdown describes how globalization can be tamed, what enormous power the new social movements unfold and who the actors are who oppose the project world society. Schumann is today editor at the "Tagespiegel" and already wrote 10 years ago as a mirror journalist with H.-P. Martin against the "globalization trap" (BA 2/97). With his co-author (and M. Greffrath) he has also addressed himself with "Attac - what do the globalization critics want?" (ID 22/02). In this volume nine chapters, which often overlap, are factually and very up-to-dately recalled again, especially the shadow pages (disparity) and dangers (financial disasters, climate change, "atomillusion", "biofuel irrweg") of globalization are highlighted and documented in 9 chapters, which often overlap, and are often overtaken by the "lost successes of the world community". Hope the also globalized grassroots made use of the "globalized" (the world's power) and "the world's democratic (the world's name.
content.title_en: The global countdown: Justice or self-destruct - the future of globalization

The story of the Lord's love is a longing for the love of the Lord's love, and the love of the Lord's love is a longing for the love of the Lord's love. content.text: Prevention of eating disorders: a training program for use in schools; with CD-ROM. The manual describes in detail and practical terms the individual building blocks of a program for the prevention of eating disorders in schools. The target group are pupils who do not yet suffer from eating disorders, but because of their age are a risk group (11–13 years). This program aims to build a positive attitude towards the participants' own figure and healthy eating and movement behaviour. The program contents have been derived from the knowledge of the various risk factors in the development and maintenance of eating disorders. The focus of this program is in particular on the connection of the three main forms of eating disorders, the Anorexia nervosa, the Bulimia nervosa and the "Binge-Eating" disorder. In an introductory part these three pictures as well as explanations for the development and maintenance of eating disorders are presented. An overview of previous programs for the prevention of eating disorders and evidence of their effectiveness and conclusions, which can be drawn from this for the development and evaluation of a new prevention program. In the following main part, the training program is presented in detail for the children who use the following the evaluation exercises can be described in detail.
content.title_en: Prevention of eating disorders : a training programme for use in schools; with CD-ROM

content.text: The creative universe: the theory of the morphogenetic field. The English biochemist, representative of the "New Age Movement", published a bound, completely revised reprint of his not uncontested book 23 years after the 2nd edition (BA 2/94). His hypothesis of the morphogenic fields and the morphic resonance states that past forms and behaviours of living beings influence the present living organisms through connections across time and space. The new edition is supplemented by the latest research results, tests, experiments and experiences of the author.
content.title_en: The creative universe : the theory of the morphogenetic field

content.text: The literature offer is comparatively thin for biotechnological process engineering. The textbook of Horst Chmiel and Kollektiv has been displayed here (last 2nd edition: ID 13/06, still available). This book, together with the simulation software BioProzessTrainer, prepares the learners "for the implementation of real cultivation experiments". Thus, it complements Chmiel cited above and should be available for students of biotechnology, process technology, but also for trainees and practitioners (biological-technical employees) if the latter is used. (3)
content.title_en: Practice of bioprocess engineering : with virtual internship

content.text: Social Web. Successful, well-written textbook on the various forms of the social web (e.g. wikis, blogs, plaftforms) with conceptual explanations, technical notes, theoretical classifications, with practice questions, glossary and source references. ... skilful balance between analysis (for experts) and guide (for beginners). Successful, well-written textbook on the various forms of the social web (e.g. wikis, blogs, plaftforms) with conceptual explanations, technical hints, theoretical classifications, with practice questions, glossary and source references. ... skilful balance between analysis (for experts) and guide (for beginners)
content.title_en: Social Web

content.text: The locals of the Hungarians live in the village of Negelt, the locals of the Hungarians, the locals of the Hungarians, the locals of the Hungarians, the Hungarians of the Hungarians. Here in the Banat, their former homeland, there are still several nationalities. In front of the reader, a tableau similar to a yellowed photograph unfolds (see "Summer Fresh", BA 7/09). A sparsely populated rural area in which life runs slowly and somewhat monotonous. Nature and the changing seasons determine the rhythm of people. They live on the ruins of the past after the rejections of the 20th century. The narrator is on search for traces, this side and beyond the border. The historical Banat appears as an island of the Blessed, water as a metaphor again. The state of the main person changes with the everyday life of the people they encounter. They don't beaut like the poor life, but they refine it to some extent through the literaryly elevated language. Recommended for greater stocks In the border region between Hungary and Romania, the people live with the here and leave it to the city in the 20th century.
content.title_en: Banatsko : Roman

content.text: Color in garden design. An attractive title whose aim is to bring colour to the garden effectively into being. Color photographs show examples of particularly successful plants. However, those who want to deepen their attention to the book soon meet the limits of their capacity to absorb. The author, lecturer in the field of landscape architecture, is unfortunately unable to explain the basics of the design with plants for lay people in a comprehensible way. As already in the book "Plant Compositions" (ID 13/99), which was published in 1998, which it was about plant use in garden plants, this title - despite the beautiful colour photos - again looks very textbook-like and dry. The pages are packed with countless information about color effects, color compositions and design possibilities in the garden, so that not only lay people soon get lost in the head! Too bad about the vertaene chance, especially since the topic "Color in the garden" is important and interesting and the author would be very competent. However, the work is only suitable for a specialist audience and not for hobby gardeners. (3)
content.title_en: Color in garden design

content.text: Methodical development of technical products : Methods are flexible and appropriate to the situation. Development of technical products is far more than design and design. Value management, customer requirements, corporate design - only a few keywords that describe the complexity. If the available time is measured only in months, then new, systematic methods for organizing product development are required. This book focuses on the description and networking of proven working methods in product development. The methods are described in their structure and mechanisms of action, not as 'recipes', but as a meaningful chain of questions and alternative ways of answering these questions. This brings to the fore methods of less complexity, thereby supporting the necessary application flexibility. For the selection of methods and adaptation, effects and side effects of the methods are described and more complex methods such as scenario technology, QFD, TRIZ and FMEA are presented in a specific application situation. The appropriate approach results from the optimal combination of the individual methods, flexible application and adaptation to the framework conditions. The development manager can thus flexibly optimize his approach. The good response to the book made a second edition necessary, in which the application knowledge is based on a further extended one.
content.title_en: Methodological development of technical products : Methods flexible and appropriate to the situation

content.text: Sustainable management of companies : Basic principles of industrial environmental management. The textbook provides an easy-to-reach introduction to sustainable management and is particularly suitable for students of economic studies without prior knowledge. In a uniform conceptual framework, it deals primarily with questions of industrial environmental management. Based on the description of natural, ethical, legal and economic framework conditions, various orientations of the company policy and strategy, their implications for management as well as the environmental-oriented design of the company value creation are dealt with.
content.title_en: Sustainable management of companies : basic principles of industrial environmental management

content.text: Technical projects: implementation, documentation, presentation. On the basis of a continuous example, implementation (organisation, structure), documentation (separation, text design), presentation of technical projects in small, clearly formulated, multi-photographed sections are presented. Elementary introduction to project management for students, trainees, practitioners of technical disciplines. In the annex, references to standards. A CD-ROM (starts independently) is attached, which contains tasks on files, graphics and a collection of forms. Books on project management are numerous, but are usually at a much higher level. (2 S)
content.title_en: Technical projects : implementation, documentation, presentation

content.text: Sustainable tourism in the North and Baltic Seas: the need for governance and the possibilities for regional planning. Tourism plays an increasing role on the German North and Baltic Sea coasts in the management of spatial development through regional and regional planning. Responsible for the fact that tourism as an economic sector is subject to an above-average dynamic. The leisure sector is generally subject to a strong change in terms of consumption habits, supply forms and global conditions of leisure and holiday. Also on the North and Baltic Seas one has to react to it. As a result, numerous large and small projects, which are almost exclusively located near the coast, are affected by spatial planning extremely sensitive zones. In the assessment of the projects, high care is required especially in the regional and regional planning. The present volume contains a number of individual contributions on this topic and concludes with concrete recommendations on the consideration of tourism in regional and regional planning.
content.title_en: Sustainable tourism in the North and Baltic Sea: governance needs and opportunities of regional and regional planning

content.text: Introduction to net didactics : Teaching and learning in the knowledge society. Media educator Moser combines proven models of didactics, newer learningheoric insights and current media pedagogical approaches and develops from this overview his concept of a "net didactics media pedagogical Moser combines proven models of didactics, newer learningheoric insights and current media pedagogical approaches together and develops from this overview his concept of a "net didactics".
content.title_en: Introduction to the network didactics: Teaching and learning in the knowledge society

content.text: The wet mining: exploration, extraction, preparation, evaluation. The book is intended as a textbook for the technical study for students of process engineering/processing technology, mining/district mining and geotechnics as well as as as a technical book for the specialists in the production plants of the gravel and sand industry, in relevant engineering companies and authorities. The extraction of gravel and sand is a significant industry. In Germany over 300 million gravel and sand (preferably wet) are collected and processed annually. This is done permanently in about 1500 plants. Because of the quantitative limitations of each individual occurrence, frequently occurring changes in the raw material condition of the deposits in the mining and changes in the sales possibilities for the products are to be made with great frequency replanning for extraction and processing projects as well as reoptimizations for existing plants. In this situation it is important for all involved in such projects to have methods, data, solution suggestions etc. to be available, with the help of which justified decisions can be taken safely and expeditiously. The first book on the topic - with all aspects of wet extraction methods, data, data, and a comprehensive case study guide to each.
content.title_en: Wet mining : exploration, extraction, preparation, evaluation

content.text: The book describes both important chemical reactions that are the basis of the production processes of the materials and the technical applications of these materials. It is primarily aimed at students of engineering who are involved in the production, processing, finishing and application of materials in their studies. Important chemical reactions that are the basis of the production processes are described as well as the technical applications of these materials. The chemistry and the technical application of metallic materials, plastics, ceramics and glasses are dealt with. In an introductory chapter on the chemistry of some non-metallic elements, the book also provides important basic chemical knowledge and knowledge of materials. Furthermore, it contains numerous references to important overview articles on certain materials and material groups that serve the reader to deepen.
content.title_en: Chemicals of materials

content.text: The Federal Republic of Germany: with updated data in 1989 and an outlook on the new Länder. Current national monograph with a focus on economic and social geography; already for pupils (Sek. II).
content.title_en: The Federal Republic of Germany: updated data 1989 and an outlook on the new Länder

content.text: Atlas of World Disorders : a chartbook on global poverty, global ecology and local commitment. Who is the "Third World"? The Club of the Rich. The seven ecological dangers of humanity. Overconsumption and poverty destroy the environment. Population explosion - autoexplosion. Prosperity eats progress. People in absolute poverty. Crisis continent Africa. Child labor. Trade partner Third World. Debt service is taking place. German banks and the debt crisis. Strangely awarding development aid. Worldwide refugee flows. Asylum abuse? ...
content.title_en: Atlas of World Disorders: a book on global poverty, global ecology and local commitment

content.text: The European Union's energy and climate policy: an inventory and perspective. Energy and climate policy issues have become the focus of public attention in recent years. Due to the complex challenge of achieving an equally sustainable, competitive and secure energy supply, the realisation has been established that the prospects for success of energy policy can be significantly increased by a common approach at European level. This study provides for the first time a systematic introduction to the emerging energy and climate policy of the European Union. The analysis of the main fields of action and instruments not only involves the interests of the main stakeholder groups, but also takes into account the specific institutional framework of European policy making.
content.title_en: The European Union's energy and climate policy: stocktaking and prospects

content.text: USA : new spatial developments or a New Regional Geography; 130 maps and illustrations as well as 36 overviews and 97 tables, CD-ROM with texts, statistics and photos. Revised and extended by about one third of the most recent edition of the regional studies discussed in BA 6/91 with economic and political focus. For geography teaching, the title offers a wide range of material, including statistical and maps and graphs; sources and references unfortunately end (with few exceptions) in 1999. The CD-ROM, in which the basic data are unfortunately not much more up-to-date, complements the volume with picture material, press releases (no press articles) also recent dates, as well as statistics. Internet links allow the search for current data. For pupils of upper secondary school II next to Helmut Blume (Scientific Book Society; ID 14/88), which is well used by the target group. (2 S) (LK/WES: Friebel) Country studies for geography teaching, mainly secondary school II, with a focus on economic geography and politics. (LK/WES: Friebel)
content.title_en: USA : new spatial developments or a new regional geography; 130 maps and graphs; 36 overviews and 97 tables; CD-ROM with texts, statistics and photos

content.text: The case of Darwin : Evolution theory versus belief in creation. The Jesuit Kummer tries to prevent a relapse of the Christian churches into the Middle Ages and rejects their resurgence of the claim to be "in possession of a higher knowledge". As a theologian and biologist, he does so here with a defense of evolution theory against creationism and as a theologian of a modern faith in a God who "powers that things make themselves" against the literal biblical interpretation. The author understands how to convey his line of argumentation excitingly, through a text supported with many successful images, well-expressed, to every interested person. Besides it also succeeds in a rough but very understandable introduction to evolution theory at present. As an outstanding publication on the subject of creation theory and evolution under the multitude of new publications in the anniversary year of Darwin and in the 150th year after the publication of the work "On the Origin of Species ..." (here most recently the German standard translation, BA 8/88) before G. Altner (ID 46/02), D. Hattrup (BA 1/09 wide), "ID/08 or Darwin".
content.title_en: Darwin's Case : Evolutionary Theory versus Creature

content.text: The Duden in twelve volumes: the standard work on the German language / ed. from the Scientific Council of the Dudenredaktion: Matthias Wermke ... ; Vol. 12: Duden - Quotations and pronouncements : [Origin and current use; about 7,500 quotations from classical antiquity to the present]. The 3rd (preface BA 6/02) was supplemented and improved. An introduction to the quotation in history and German present language. As in the preliminary edition, the volume is then divided into 2 parts: an alphabetical and a systematic list. Origin and present use are detailed, mostly colored illustrations lighten up the text. A source directory and a person register round off the volume. Furthermore, highly recommended. (1 S) The 3rd edition (preface BA 6/02) was supplemented and improved. An introduction brings theoretical to the quotation in history and German present language. As in the preliminary edition, the volume is then divided into 2 parts: an alphabetical and a systematic list. Origin and today's use are illustrated in detail, mostly colored illustrations.
content.title_en: The Duden in twelve volumes : the Standard Work on the German Language / ed. by the Scientific Council of the Dudenredaktion: Matthias Wermke ... ; Vol. 12: Duden - Quotations and Propositions : [Origin and Current Use ; about 7,500 quotations from classical antiquity to the present]

content.text: You have to change your life: through anthropotechnics. In his new great essay on the nature of man, Peter Sloterdijk writes fairy tales: As a critique of the fairy tale of the return of religion one could understand his theses. But religion does not return. Rather, it creates something quite fundamental in the present: Man as a practitioner, than being self-creating through exercises. Rainer Maria Rilke has taken the impulse to such retreats at the beginning of the 20th century into form: "You must change your life."In his plea for the extension of the exercise zone of individuals and society, Peter Sloterdijk drafts a fundamental and fundamentally new anthropology. The core of his science of man is the insight into self-formation of all human beings. His activities constantly re-act on him: the work on the worker, the communication on the communists, the feelings on the feelers. ... It is the explicitly practicing people who represent this mode of existence most clearly: peasants, workers, warriors, writers, yogi, teachers, instrumental virtuostics, and the exercises of this maximum of their human exercises.
content.title_en: You have to change your life : about anthropotechnics

content.text: History of social security. One of the major issues of the present and the coming decades is the question of the future of the welfare state. Its pillars of economic growth, generational contract, redistribution, social security "from the cradle to the grave" are shaken. The question of the future is also a question of the past. Therefore, the author discusses the development of social assistance from the Middle Ages to the immediate present, with the focus on Britain, France and Germany, but also Austria, Sweden, Italy and the USA. Special attention is paid to the 19th and 20th centuries.
content.title_en: History of social security

content.text: Automation with PLC : Theory and practice ; Programming: DIN EN 61131-3, STEP 7, CoDeSys, design processes, building blocks libraries ; Applications: Controls, regulations, drives, safety ; Communication: AS-i-Bus, PROFIBUS, Ethernet-TCP/IP, PROFINET, Web-Technologies, OPC ; with 106 control examples and 7 projecting. To commemorate the discussion on the first edition (BA 11/02): It is a "basic textbook" ... "it explains the material very practical based on numerous examples". This 4th edition is now extended by 27 pages compared to the 1st (at the same price), because there are now also solutions in CoDeSys ( = free to refer to programming system specifically for training and study), in addition to the already existing in STEP 7. New is also a chapter on modern drive technology. Furthermore, the material has been continuously revised and reorganized overall. The topic is very topical, therefore for many (students at vocational and at technician schools, FH-H students) The practice of the university of operation is still used in the field of business.
content.title_en: Automation with PLC : Theory and practice ; Programming: DIN EN 61131-3, STEP 7, CoDeSys, design processes, building block libraries ; Applications: Controls, control systems, drives, safety ; Communication: AS-i-Bus, PROFIBUS, Ethernet-TCP/IP, PROFINET, Web technologies, OPC ; with 106 control examples and 7 projectings

content.text: The rise of the others: the post-American age. The tallest buildings, the most powerful dams, the largest aircraft and the most innovative mobile phones are no longer from the USA, but from countries like India, China, Russia or Brazil. In his equally brightly-sighted and brilliantly written book, Fareed Zakaria shows what the rapid economic and political rise of these >>other states means for the entire Western world and gives a surprising insight into the post-American age. The tallest buildings, the most powerful dams, the largest aircraft and the most innovative mobile phones are already coming from countries like India, China, Russia or Brazil, not from the USA but from countries like India, Russia or Brazil. In his equally brightly-sighted and brilliantly-written book, Fareed Zakaria shows what the rapid economic and political rise of these ?other? states means for the entire Western world and gives a surprising insight into the post-American age.
content.title_en: The Rise of Others : the Post-American Age

content.text: ECDL: the European Computer Guide Certificate; the complete course book for Microsoft Office 2007 according to Syllabus 5.0; [DLGI-approved learning material ECDL 5.0; CD, exam questions, practice exercises]. The latest edition of the training book for the European Computer Guide Certificate ECDL. Based on the modular curriculum (Syllabus 5.0), the book supports the preparation for the 7 partial exams: basics of information technology, computer use, word processing, spreadsheet, databases, presentation and information and communication. Unlike the edition displayed in spring (BA 10/08, may expire), the content is now based on Windows Vista, Office 2007 and Outlook 2007. While the structure of the book has remained unchanged, the individual subject sections have been updated, changed or supplemented. The volume of the book has thus been added by 120 pages. This title should therefore be an absolute complement to the predecessor.
content.title_en: ECDL : the European Computer Guide; the complete course book for Microsoft Office 2007 according to Syllabus 5.0; [DLGI-approved learning material ECDL 5.0; CD, exam questions, practice exercises]

content.text: Urban surfers, quarter fans & co. : Urban constructions of young people and the network of urban public spaces. How do young people use their city today? How do they use urban space, which cities young people construct for themselves? Much too little is known about the qualities and limitations of young people in public spaces. A research project by the Wüstenrot Foundation dealt with these questions in an interdisciplinary team of landscape architecture, architecture, urban planning and sociology at the STUDIO URBAN LANDSCHAFTEN at Leibniz University Hannover. With new approaches, the project shows above all what impulses young people can provide for a city development practice that can better recognise and take into account their needs.
content.title_en: Urban surfers, quarter fans & co. : Urban constructions of young people and the network of urban public spaces

content.text: Efficient programming with Visual Studio: [250 tips to improve your productivity]. Visual Studio is an integrated development environment of Microsoft for Visual Basic, C++/CLI and C[sharp], i.e. for .NET languages. C. Skibo (ID 11/06) reports on possibilities of customizing Visual Studio (e.g. using add-ins) and strong simplifications of object-oriented programming with Visual Studio. The previous version Visual Studio 2005 is dealt with there, so that the new interesting possibilities of the current versions 3.0 and 3.5 of the .NET framework are not yet taken into account. The author of this book is a member of the Visual Studio product team and has to try out all the features and possibilities of Visual Studio, also in the current version 2008, and their experiences almost here are combined in 250 tips. Focuses are on the editor, the search and the layout. But debugging is also well taken into account. Great importance is attached to the fact that the suggestions can be implemented easily and quickly; the programming should become more efficient. - Special knowledge is not required of the reader (2).
content.title_en: Efficient programming with Visual Studio : [250 Tips to Improve Your Productivity]

content.text: The book "Food Chemistry and Nutrition". Today, food chemistry is presented as a multidisciplinary subject, both across subjects outside chemistry and within the chemical fields. This textbook meets this interdisciplinary requirement: Based on the material composition of the food, links between characteristic chemical structures, ingredients and their physiological effect are described using concrete examples. The main nutrients, vitamins, colorants and flavourings are well structured in occurrences, chemism and physiological importance as well as in analytical questions. Food conservation, additives and 'free radicals', which are often produced as products of redox reactions in biological systems, are also not too short. This book is primarily aimed at students of the nutritional sciences, food sciences and related disciplines.
content.title_en: Food Chemistry and Nutrition

content.text: Practical folder for the perfect internet application: e-mail application, online forms, application website, online assessment center, cross-media application and short application. Practical tips and examples of the efficient online application; with step-by-step instructions and numerous screen images.
content.title_en: Practical folder for the perfect Internet application : e-mail application, online forms, application website, online assessment center, cross-media application and short application

content.text: The Western disempowerment: the new order of the world. Russia makes the muscles play militarily in the Caucasus, China grows into an economic giant, India is growing nuclear weapons. These are epochal changes, but Europeans are hard to understand. They react to the industrialization of Asia with debates about loss of prosperity, new wars with moral indignation. Nikola's Busse, correspondent of the FAZ in Brussels, observes in Germany a climate of economic fears that does not in any way meet the political dynamics of world affairs. The upheavals of our time go far beyond the relocation of jobs. In Asia, but also in Latin America, new power centers are emerging that put an end to the centuries-long dominance of the West in world politics.
content.title_en: Disempowerment of the West: the New Order of the World

content.text: Journalism online - Participation or Profession?. Online journalism has long been one of the major fashion topics in the media industry. However, with the decline of the "New Economy", net-based journalism has experienced a deep crisis: many of the online editorial campaigns that were built up with great effort have been re-set or severely exploited in terms of personnel and financial resources. However, the Internet has now reached a new stage of development: with the slogan "Web 2.0", participatory formats such as weblogs and collaborative websites are labeled, which enable users to actively participate in the public sphere in the communicator role. Often in this context, actors, structures, processes and achievements of new forms of current internet publicity are discussed facet-rich. In addition to German-speaking communication scientists, international experts and recognized practitioners also come up with latest developments. Press statements "Rejoicably many articles in the book are used [...]
content.title_en: Journalism online - Participation or Profession?

content.text: The book explains the 'How and Why' of the measurement and analysis of response times for computer-based population surveys. Methods for empirically collecting response times (e.g. active or passive time measurement methods) are explained as well as statistical methods for treating and cleaning the collected response times (e.g. operationalization and control of individual base speeds and statistical identification of invalid time measurements). The book describes many application examples of reaction time analyses from current research practice. Applications from the recruitment and behavioral research and the investigation of respondents' behaviour (e.g. detection of response effects) illustrate the wide range of possibilities open to the evaluation of reaction time measurements for improving survey analyses. Dr. Dieter Urban is Professor of Sociology at the Institute of Social Sciences at the University of Stuttgart. Dr. Jochen Mayerl is a research associate at the Institute of Social Sciences at the University of Stuttgart.
content.title_en: Response times in survey analyses : measurement, evaluation and applications

content.text: SolidWorks : Design injection moulding tools effectively. The practice and reference tool deals with the construction of injection moulding tools with SolidWorks. Only recently has the possibility to use 3D catalogs of normal manufacturers effectively. The reader learns about them from many examples and exercises. He uses the many possibilities of SolidWorks in the field of molding and surface modelling.The entire tool construction up to the derivation of electrodes and drawing creation is carried out for an article - an ice scraper.The numerous exercises are didactically designed so that the reader can use his own construction instead of this article. Any start is possible, since intermediate steps can be accessed from the university server.
content.title_en: SolidWorks : Designing injection moulding tools effectively

content.text: Symbols of Life - Symbols of Faith : Workbook for Religion and Catechesis / Elsbeth Bihler ; Vol. 2: Water Cross. Also the completely revised volume 2 of the successful workbook series Symbols of Life Symbols of Faith gives practical inspiration for working with selected symbols as a sign of God's presence and his attention to people. Each separate chapter offers stories and texts, songs, dance and music, design ideas, silence exercises as well as games and actions that open up the symbols of water, ship, desert, earth, mountain, tree, path and cross with all senses to children, young people and adults. The keyword list helps to quickly find suitable offers for personal needs (description of publishing).
content.title_en: Symbols of Life - Symbols of Faith : Book of Religion and Catechesis / Elsbeth Bihler ; Vol. 2: Water - Cross

content.text: The literature of the 18th century and the Romantic period in a new perspective: the impetus of the natural sciences of the 17th/18th century to the emergence of the literature of modernism and the design of a world peace plan. Introduction to the problem -- the foundation of the modern self- and world understanding by natural research -- The contribution of natural sciences to the emergence of classical-romantic poetry -- On the way to a universal understanding of nature and culture.
content.title_en: 18th century literature and romanticism in a new perspective: the impetus of the 17th/18th century natural sciences to the emergence of modern literature and the design of a world peace plan

content.text: The basic course on plant design: planning and design for every garden style. The fact that the author has taught basic techniques of garden design at a renowned college is clear in this book. In their opinion, each garden owner should become his own garden designer. The necessary textbook has created them. On closely described pages, which are slightly loosened by colour photographs, she gives her knowledge of plants and their competent use in the garden price. Plants are for her design material, whose use must be selected according to shape, texture and color with care. It is also important to take into account the location conditions. Only then is it possible to create planting plans. These plans are decisively influenced by the chosen garden style. Whether elaborate garden in cottage style with traditional stowing discounts or care-free, modern garden with minimalist planting - this basic decision must be made in advance.
content.title_en: Basic course Plant Design : Planning and Design for every garden style

content.text: The author has already published 2 challenging books in the series "Der Gartenprofi" (see "Designing with plants", BA 7/06, and "Hecks and green walls", BA 12/07). In this detailed book he recommends that gardens be included in the garden planning. Introducing the history of the garden from monastery to Schreberg species. He also goes on to the basics of gardening from soil cultivation to harvesting, from mixed culture to crop protection. The book's actual focus is on planning and installation of gardens. Kolb presents practical examples of house gardens of different sizes and uses. He finds examples of themed gardens such as scent and herbs gardens, gardens for nature lovers, gardens for gourmets. The practical work book is equipped with colour photos, construction drawings and planting plans. According to the standard work "Der Biogarten" by M. Kreuter (topped BA 5/09). (2)
content.title_en: Farm gardens : the technical and workbook

content.text: EN EN 755-8 [Reg.] EN EN EN 755-8 [Reg.] EN EN EN 755-3 ; DIN EN 755-4 ; DIN EN 755-5 ; DIN EN 755-5 ; DIN EN 755-5 ; DIN EN 755-5 ; DIN EN 755-6 ; DIN EN 755-6 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-2 ; DIN EN 755-2 ; DIN EN 755-2 ; DIN EN 755-6 ; DIN EN 755-6 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-7 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-1 ; DIN EN 755-2 [rec 1] DIN EN EN EN EN EN EN EN EN 755 - 8 EN EN EN EN 1355 - EN EN EN EN 1355 - EN EN EN EN 1355 - EN EN EN EN EN 1355 -01 - 13 - EN EN EN EN EN EN EN EN EN - 13 13 - DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN - 1 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 13 - DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN - 1 - DIN DIN - 1 755 - DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN - 1 701 - DIN DIN DIN - 1 - DIN DIN DIN DIN - 1 - 701 - 701 - 701 - DIN DIN DIN - 701 - DIN - DIN - DIN - 1 701 - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - 701 - DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN - 701 - DIN - 701 - 7 7 701 - 701 - 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 - 701 - 7 7 7 - 7 - 701 - 701 - 7 7 7 7 7 701 - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN DIN DIN DIN DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN - DIN
