content.text: CSS : missing manual; [the missing manual for your website]. The successful and popular Missing Manual series has the aim of introducing entertaining and yet professional into current topics. In the original, it is also very good. And, who would have thought it possible: The German translation keeps the loose tone and the book reads fluently as the original text. The translator is highly praised here. This is how it is fun to read the book. In terms of content, it is a basic work to the CSS. However, it is more demanding than the introductions to "Dummie" level. This is especially noticeable by technical details, which are often dropped elsewhere, because they look a bit dry (e.g. doctypes, rarer inheritance rules etc.). For a more ambitious, elegant and clean programming, this information is very important from the beginning. Very good is also the detailed chapter on page layout with CSS, one of the most common and problematic application areas for every web developer. Overall, a very good book for a long-term burning of web programming (1).
content.title_en: CSS : missing manual ; [the missing manual to your website]

content.text: Common differential equations : an introduction from the perspective of dynamic systems. The book provides a compact and fundamental introduction to the theory of ordinary differential equations from the perspective of dynamic systems in the scope of a single-semester lecture. Beyond the discussion of the basic solution theory and the theory of linear systems, analytical and numerical solution methods, basic concepts of the theory of dynamic systems, stability, branches and Hamilton systems are discussed. The material is illustrated and deepened in detail by means of examples, exercises and computer experiments. The book is particularly suitable for the bachelor's degree program, both during the lecture course of the module 'Common differential equation equations' for students in the 3rd semester as well as for self-study.
content.title_en: Common differential equations : an introduction from the perspective of dynamic systems

content.text: Fire protection in the existing building: wood. The requirements for fire protection in the existing building are in stark contrast to the very abstract demands of the new building standards, which are often arranged for existing buildings. In the everyday renovation case, fire protection measures are the main focus on the one hand and the elimination of concrete danger sources on the other. However, in relation to a building monument in particular, it must be taken into account how far an intervention in the valuable building material may go, so that the monument remains a monument and nothing loses its identity. Special precautions must be taken here in the renovation of wooden supporting and construction structures. The author deals with this problem as well as the absolutely necessary level of safety of wooden structures in monuments. He illuminates the various aspects of equal importance, which must be taken into account both from the point of view of fire protection and the protection of monuments.
content.title_en: Fire protection in the inventory: wood

content.text: Microcontrollers for beginners : Design circuits and program software; [on CD-ROM: sample programs, layout data, schematics, data sheets]. As introductions to microcontrollers, B. Kainka (BA 8/04) and U. Brinkschulte (ID 12/03) were discussed earlier. The present book is very up-to-date. Programming is limited to assemblers - even with regard to the required hardware proximity. The examples of the book are based on the PIC16F876A of microchip. This chip has various interfaces and features, which can be used to present a wide range of functionalities. For programming and debugging, the in-circuit debugger ICD2 of microchip is used free of charge. Microcontrollers are to be used in circuits. The author presents a small development board, with which all examples can be tested in a real environment. - Good consideration is given to the control of displays, the evaluation of digital signals, the data storage in an external EEPROM, the communication with a PC and the infrared remote control of the outputs of a microcontroller.
content.title_en: Microcontrollers for beginners : Design circuits and program software; [on CD-ROM: sample programs, layout data, schematics, data sheets]

content.text: The BMBF funding programme "Research for the reduction of land use and sustainable land management" (REFINA) also addresses the National Sustainability Strategy in its projects. On the way to a land cycle economy and sustainable land management, the financial aspects of settlement development are a central problem. Various REFINA research associations analyse cost structures and develop solutions for the financing of land recycling or for the production of cost transparency in settlement area development. Tools for creating more transparency about the subsequent costs of settlement development at the municipal and regional level are also being developed. It proved to be beneficial that numerous municipalities or regional actors are closely involved in REFINA projects. This volume presents the results achieved in the REFINA projects in expert papers. The contributions focus on methods, characteristics and possible uses of tools for subsequent cost consideration. The publication is rounded off by contributions from external experts with a profunden experience in this current field of research.
content.title_en: Follow-up costs of settlement development : assessment approaches, models and tools of cost-benefit analysis

content.text: Environmental justice and pollution of immissions, based on the example of the city of Kassel. The lack of social differentiation in air pollution planning was one of the reasons for the research project described here at the University of Kassel, which was carried out in 2006/2007 by the Department of Environmental Meteorology (FG Umet) and the Center for Environmental Systems Research (CESR).The aim of the project is to investigate the links between social structure and environmental quality in two city districts of Kassel in an exemplary manner. Kassel is a field of study, as in some other urban areas, it is also possible to exceed the limit value for fine dust pollution and, as a result, it is a plan of air pollution.In the context of this research project, it is primarily about obtaining small-scale data on both environmental quality and social structure, developing research programmes currently in the development process and identifying additional research needs.
content.title_en: Environmental justice and immission burdens, using the example of the city of Kassel

content.text: Landscape gardens in Germany. Note International Hölderlin Bibliography: p. 62: The Dessau-Wörlitz Garden Kingdom of Prince Franz (p. 83: zu Hölderlin)
content.title_en: Landscape gardens in Germany

content.text: Afghanistan Code : a report on war, fundamentalism and democracy. Marc Thörner has spent two years researching Afghanistan. 'Embedded' in various armies and alone in the country, he has spoken to military, diplomats, mullahs, judges, politicians, governors, warlords and other people in different parts of the country. Islamic extremism, as his provocative thesis, does not threaten the West. On the contrary, it is an important element to secure Western hegemony.
content.title_en: Afghanistan Code : a report on war, fundamentalism and democracy

content.text: On the way to biopowerful society?: Opportunities and risks of genetic engineering. Numerous research results show that the idea of old genetics, which determines everything by genes, is scientifically at the end. However, the transition from old genetics to new genetics, from genetic determinism to system biological epigenetics is connected with great uncertainties, search processes and reorientations. In transdisciplinary cooperation, the authors analyse the current findings and their consequences in bioethical and risk analysis aspects. A critical view from different perspectives results in a sound overall view, which addresses different fields of application of life sciences. Prof. Dr. phil. habil. Achim Bühl teaches technology sociology with the emphasis on technology assessment and future research at the Hochschule für Technik Berlin.
content.title_en: Towards a biopowerful society? : Opportunities and risks of genetic engineering

content.text: Split cities?: social and ethnic segregation in German cities. Where does the poorer population live, where the foreigners? How have the spatial distributions of both groups changed? What is the relationship between the distributions of the two groups? The analyses in this book are directed to these questions. The social and ethnic segregation in the 15 largest cities of Germany are examined in the period 1990 to 2005. For both groups, the changes in segregation and the proportion of the two groups in the individual districts are represented, documented and explained in coloured maps.
content.title_en: Split cities? : social and ethnic segregation in German cities

content.text: Information and coding : Basics and applications ; with 72 tables. Information and coding are key concepts of modern information technology. This book provides a sound introduction to basics and applications. Apart from the usual upper level mathematics (vector and matrice calculation, elementary probability calculation) no special prior knowledge is required. Numerous images, examples and solved tasks as well as references to applications support the independent development of the teaching material. For the second edition the book was completely revised and extended. References to current applications are made and the implementation of the learned is facilitated by additional examples and tasks. Newly recorded program examples with MATLAB® establish connections to practice.
content.title_en: Information and coding : basics and applications ; with 72 tables

content.text: Microcalorymetryczne badania przemian conformacyjnych albuminy poddanej działaniu wybranych czynników fizykochemicznych. Literature verz. p. 121 - 137. - Engl. and dt. Zsfassen u.d.: Microcalorimetric study of albumin conformal changes induced by various physicochemical factors. - Microcalorimetric investigations of transformations of albumin exposed to the influence of selected physicochemical factors
content.title_en: Microcalorymetryczne badania przemian conformacyjnych albuminy poddanej działaniu wybranych czynników fizykochemicznych

content.text: Calculation of three-phase current networks: Calculation of stationary and non-stationary processes with symmetric components and space-liners. This textbook, which has been developed from many years of lecture activity, describes the most important calculation methods for three-phase current networks in a modern systematic version. The extremely advantageous node-oriented presentation runs like a red thread through the book. The main focus is on the calculation with symmetric components in the frequency range based on the classical node-point procedure and the calculation with space-point components in the time range based on the new extended node-point procedure. For the calculation of any error states (short circuits and interruptions) a new universal procedure is presented with the error matrice method, which can be applied equally to the symmetric components and space-point components. The versions are made more understandable by numerous calculated examples and supplemented by two MATLAB program codes for the calculation of the flow of power and the error matrice procedure.
content.title_en: Calculation of three-phase power grids : Calculation of stationary and non-stationary processes with symmetric components and space-liners

content.text: The contents are oriented towards the reordering of the technical vehicle professions. In addition, extensive information about the bicycle. Large table section. As reference work also indispensable in two-wheeled enterprises. Comprehensive standard work of general bicycle technology. The contents are oriented towards the reordering of the technical vehicle professions. In addition, extensive information about the bicycle. Large table section. As reference work also indispensable in two-wheeled enterprises
content.title_en: Technical knowledge Bicycle technology

content.text: The new generation contract: social-state renewal in the crisis. The debate about the future of retirement provision does not want to ebb. And this despite the deepest crisis in the history of the Federal Republic. This may be surprising at first glance – but the internal connection between the crisis debate and the future of retirement provision cannot be overlooked: Thus the (partial) privatization of the pension was and is one of those sources that flooded overflowing financial resources into the markets, fueled speculation and thus became a "crisis driver". Secondly, rising unemployment and falling incomes threaten to undermine the income base of the statutory pension and to become the "crisis victim" of retirement. However, a wise retirement policy could play a not to be underestimated role in overcoming the crisis. Do the income of pensioners contribute to stabilising domestic demand. And: The regulation of a flexible retirement age increase to fair conditions instead of the pension with 67, on the other hand, could not only counter the pension-related year, but open up the opportunities for young people to a job in crises. However, in order to make a contribution to the existing age-based insurance system, the new age-based system must be re-applied.
content.title_en: The new generation treaty: social-state renewal in crisis

content.text: Media Resonance Analysis : an introduction to theory and practice. The textbook is aimed at students and practitioners who want to gain an overview of the most important fields of application and the research practice of media resonance analysis. In the first part, the method is classified into the context of the basic research on communication science and application-oriented evaluation research. A case study is used to present the individual research practice steps in the second part.The detailed explanation of the case study and the detailed documented research instrument form a practical handout, which gives a variety of quality criteria to the hand in order to assess and interpret media resonance analyses with knowledge Juliana Raupp is a university professor of journalism and communication science at the Freie Universität Berlin with a focus on organizational communication. Jens Vogelgesang is a scientific assistant in the field of communication science (in particular interactive media and online communication) at the University of Hohenheim.
content.title_en: Media Resonance Analysis : an Introduction to Theory and Practice

content.text: Future-oriented change in hospital management : outsourcing, IT benefits, forms of cooperation, change management. Within the healthcare sector, the hospital sector plays a central role. In recent years, a profound change has taken place. In the book, leading practitioners and scientists show how a forward-looking approach to important issues such as IT solutions, outsourcing strategies, horizontal privatisations as a form of cooperation as well as change management could look like. The book thus provides a broad know-how for administrators and physicians about important areas of modern hospital management.
content.title_en: Future-oriented change in hospital management : outsourcing, IT benefits, forms of cooperation, change management

content.text: Atlas of globalization: [see and understand what moves the world]. The latest Atlas of globalization brings to mind a thoroughly changed world: the world economy is in the deepest crisis since 1945, the emerging BRIC countries (Brazil, Russia, India, China) are shifting geopolitical power relations, and with Barack Obama the times of the unilaterally operating Americanum Passé empire seem to be. The latest Atlas of globalization is in the midst of a thoroughly changed world: the world economy is in the deepest crisis since 1945, the emerging BRIC countries (Brazil, Russia, India, China) are shifting geopolitical power relations, and with Barack Obama the times of the unilaterally operating Americanum Passé empire seem to be
content.title_en: Atlas of globalization : [see and understand what moves the world]

content.text: Urbanity replanning : Urban planning, urban conversion, urban development. Based on the facts of declining population figures and social focal points in certain quarters of German cities, a team of authors from different disciplines deals with 11 articles on the needs, possibilities and limits of urban planning oriented towards developments. Topics on the problem of "shrinking and perforating" communities are: practical examples of "urban conversion", the need for qualified immigration, the importance of civic engagement, tendencies of "district flight" and the departure from "urban pessimism". Detailed comments and literature at the end of each chapter. Not abstract, but oriented towards individual projects and problems, therefore useful and important not only for planners, but also for interested and committed city dwellers. (2) (Erdmann Steinmetz) Contributions to urban planning and development in Germany in view of declining population figures, social problems and scarce financial resources. (Erdmann Steinmetz)
content.title_en: Replanning urbanity : urban planning, urban conversion, urban development

content.text: Conscience: ethical problems of computer science; biometry - data protection - intellectual property. When dealing with digital technologies every day, we rarely ask ourselves how our actions could affect third parties. This book deals with current problems of responsibility in the digital world. It gathers German-speaking cases on ethical issues of computer science and provides valuable ideas with the presentation of credible conflicts in the fields of data protection, biometry or intellectual property, which encourage further thought.
content.title_en: Regrettably : ethical problems of computer science ; biometry - data protection - intellectual property

content.text: The young novel. Martin Schlosser, the hero of the childhood and youth novel, breaks up as a thirteen-year-old in the small town of Meppen in Emsland to new adventures, in the bright summer of 1975, and they lead him deep down into the horrors of puberty and into the struggle with a world that simply does not want to understand that he means well with her: He wants to shoot gates for Germany and find the fulfillment of all his dreams in a great love. Is that too much to ask? At the beginning it looks quite like this, and in the end it is more than enough... Martin Schlosser, the hero of the childhood and youth novel, as a thirteen-year-old in the small town of Meppen in Emsland, he sets out to find new adventures, in the bright summer of 1975, and they lead him deep down into the horrors of puberty and into the struggle with a world that simply does not want to understand that he means well with her: He wants to shoot gates for Germany and find the fulfillment of all his dreams in a great love. Is this too much to demand? At the beginning it looks quite like this, and at the end it is quite so, and at all, and at all, in the end, quite quite so, in the end, it.
content.title_en: Youth novel

content.text: The Stirling motor : simply explained and easily built. Publisher's text: After an easy-to-understand introduction to the function and characteristics of Stirling machines, the author describes the construction of a functional model Stirling motor, made of an ordinary can and easy-to-rebuild wooden parts. All work steps are documented in detail with mass-scale drawings and pictures.
content.title_en: The Stirling motor: simply explained and built easily

content.text: Optimization & livelihood assurance in the hospitality industry. (ekz) A business consultant gives tips on cost control, price calculation and controlling, employee motivation, financial management, etc. in the hospitality industry. Provides easy-to-understand information on risk minimisation and eliminates unnecessary theoretical ballast. Checklists are scattered after each main section with important points of interest. In the annex a list of funding areas for regional economic promotion.
content.title_en: Optimization & safeguarding of livelihood in the hospitality industry

content.text: The present guide informs old building owners who plan to convert older oil and gas heating systems to more efficient and regenerative heating systems because of constantly increasing energy prices and for climate protection reasons. (Elke Nibbrig) The author already has 3 titles on old building renovation and modern heating technology displayed here (ID 40/09, BA 3/09, BA 2/09). The present guide informs old building owners who plan to convert older oil and gas heating systems to more efficient and regenerative heating systems because of constantly increasing energy prices and for climate protection reasons. After a short introduction to economic efficiency and environmental protection, wood heating systems, power-heat-cogeneration, heat pump heating, gas heat pump and the combination of solar panels with the heating system are treated. Finally, it is about the optimization of existing heating systems as well as correct ventilation and cooling in heat-insulated old buildings. Intelligently written, with detailed and helpful cost-benefit comparison, diagrams, tables (s sometimes at the limit of readability), useful for example to the user.
content.title_en: Energetic correct heating modernize in old building

content.text: C++ for engineers : learn programming efficiently. The student and practitioner receives solutions from simple and complex technical questions based on sound C++ programming. One focus is on object-oriented and generic programming. The wide range of application examples is easily comprehensible and allows gradually an increase in the level. The book also contains suggestions for further work.
content.title_en: C++ for engineers : learn programming efficiently

content.text: Data analysis from head to foot. Data analysis is a bulky topic, which is conveyed and made accessible in a pleasant way. The individual steps and methods are linked with concrete tasks in the chapters and shown by this method the procedure, solutions and problems. The text is minimized, divided into different levels (documents, explanations, comments) and much is conveyed by means of examples and visualizations. A book, which is unique in its didactic concept, is ideally suited for students of the economic and social sciences to introduce the methodology. Books on the subject appear rarely, usually the data analysis is only dealt with briefly in works on empirical social research. For libraries in university locations and large collections elsewhere, since also for interested lay people suitable for browsing and reading. (3)
content.title_en: Data analysis from head to toe

content.text: Kokoschkin's Journey : Roman. On a voyage back to New York, the exiled Russian Fjodor Kokoschkin remembers the striking events from his long life that have shaped almost a political century
content.title_en: Kokoschkins Journey : Roman

content.text: The men's crisis and why it is also dangerous for women. Journalist (BA 4/06) does not again explore the soul landscapes of the battered strong sex - for them the crisis of men and of manhood is fundamental, global and highly political. Not only the women's emancipation, but also the economic and ecological faults of time are nagging the identity of men. However, the representatives of "old thinking" do not give up. They become perpetrators, block progress, in the worst case they take hold of (weapon, economic and psychological) violence: "They believe they must wage war because war makes them 'right men' again". The author tries to illustrate the consequences of this "irrational surplus" of maleness as a whole (including women) by means of political "leaders" (Obama, Putin etc.), Islamic "God warriors" and their opponents as well as other representatives of the power elite. The good news of all the bad: The solutions to all the world's problems are present - all the media- all the human rights.
content.title_en: Twilight of the Heroes : the crisis of men and why it is dangerous for women

content.text: Technology for stucco and drywall workers: with learning fields, computer and drawing; with 158 tables. This technology book provides the most important basics of the technical training for stucco and drywall workers. The contents are prepared in a practical and vivid way for the teaching and thus also excellent for self-study. The necessary expertise is divided into 11 topics, which always complete with exercise tasks. In the annex are to all learning fields of stuccobots project tasks as well as a table part. The 4th edition with newly revised pictures has been updated among others to curriculum plan and standards. "1. Choice among the specialist customers on the topic" ekz-Informationsdienst. Baubetrieb -- scaffolding -- building protection -- plastering -- screeding -- stucco work -- non-supporting internal partitions -- ceiling clothing and covering -- vault -- colour design -- architectural studies.
content.title_en: Technology for stucco and drywall workers : with learning fields, technical calculations and drawing ; with 158 tables

content.text: C++. Main description: Excellently suited to C++, still the most important language for object-oriented programming, to learn in self-study. This book serves as a supporting text for courses and as reference work. The language constructs of C++ are presented clearly with syntax diagrams. A detailed subject-word register and a directory of syntax diagrams complete the book. From the content: Insight into object-oriented programming - Constants and variables - Expressions - Instructions - Pointers and addresses - Functions and macros - Modules and projects - Life and scope of identifiers - Compound data structures - Classes - heredity - Recursion - Currents - Exception treatment - Machine-related programming.

ClimateCultures: social realities in climate change. For too long it was believed that only meteorologists, marine scientists and glacier researchers were responsible for the research of climate change. But global warming confronts people, cultures and societies with new and still barely understood challenges. Their overcoming is not only a technological but also a cultural task - it affects the lifestyle as well as fantasy and inventiveness. The cultural sciences have the important function here to make the findings of climate research in their social dimension assessable - this is, for example, about generational justice, responsibility, ways out of the guiding culture of waste, concepts of good life, in short: about the conditions of future survival. Renowned authors of cultural studies show in this volume why a change of climate inevitably leads to a cultural change. With contributions by Ulrich Beck, Dieter Birnbacher, Michael Hagner, Nils Minkmar, Birger P. Priddat, Ingo Schulze and others.
content.title_en: ClimateCultures : social realities in climate change

content.text: The book Linear Algebra and Analytical Geometry: the most important in detail for the teaching and bachelor's degree programme. Fischer's standard works on linear algebra (ID 50/08) and analytical geometry (most recently ID 43/91, not shown here) have been reliably accompanying students in basic studies in mathematics, physics and computer science for a long time. The "learning book" here now provides the most important topics for the bachelor's degree programme of these two classics. The presentation is much more detailed and accessible to beginners, the abstract conceptual formations and methods are comprehensively motivated, the basic basic principles are very vivid and detailed and provide numerous examples and illustrations that illustrate the geometric background of abstract concepts. Thus, especially for future or already in the profession, mathematics teachers are particularly suitable for future or existing teachers. The basics are treated, for further topics refer to the classics (see above). The work is better than that of A. Bagspacher (BA 3/04) and this one to prefer tasks on the Internet. For stocks with corresponding target groups priority, otherwise broadly recommended.
content.title_en: Learning book Linear algebra and analytical geometry : the most important in detail for the teaching and bachelor's degree programme

content.text: Just live better : Sustainability as a new lifestyle. The theme of the yearbook "Zur Lage der Welt 2010" (Preliminary edition, see BA 7/09) is "Simply live better - sustainability as a new lifestyle". The prosperity on the go, the future generations have to pay, cannot go on. Our consumption behaviour must change. We need a new culture of sustainability. Well live not at the expense of others! Experts of the Worldwatch Institute describe how such a change could look like. Can be used everywhere for the current discussion. (1 A,S) (LK/F: Themelidis)
content.title_en: Just live better : Sustainability as a new lifestyle

content.text: Ways to change: how to make social change more successful. Climate change, scarcity of raw materials, financial and economic crisis - the list of urgent global problems to be solved is long. They interlock, fuel each other and are symptoms of a crisis of the entire system
content.title_en: Ways to change: how to make social change more successful

content.text: New ways to venture: Innovation in education, business and society. This book on innovation focuses on two perspectives that have been neglected so far, namely, firstly a critical examination of the idea of innovation and secondly a combination of innovation ideas in a number of important social areas. All contributions address the question from a different perspective: Why innovation? As the financial crisis and its consequences have shown, innovation can become extremely dangerous and cause great damage, especially if it takes on inhumane and unethical traits. Innovation is, on the other hand, crucial for Germany's future. The authors deal with possibilities of innovation in the family, in educational institutions of elementary education, secondary education, at universities, in companies, organizations and in administration. The final chapter brings together all the authors once again and offers a kaleidoscope of proposals and ideas to what is necessary in the future for innovation and how to connect innovation and tradition in a meaningful way.
content.title_en: New ways to do this: innovation in education, economy and society

content.text: BilMoG accounting: short commentary on the annual financial statements and the management report under new accounting law. "The BilMoG is a milestone on the path to internationalisation and modernisation of commercial accounting. The new accounting law has been developed to an equivalent, yet cost-effective alternative to IFRS. Numerous voting rights are abolished, the information content of accounting is significantly increased and the integration with tax law significantly reduced. Thus, "BilMoG" is synonymous with the largest accounting reform since the 1985 Accounting Directive Act. Many questions of interpretation and doubt arise in the application of the law. In their answer, the short commentary offers comprehensive practical support."
content.title_en: BilMoG accounting : short commentary on the annual accounts and the management report under new balance sheet law

content.text: The end of the world, as we knew it: climate, future and the opportunities of democracy. The author duo Claus Leggewie (lastly on the topic of "globalization", ID 23/03 and otherwise journalistic) and Harald Welzer, political professor of the one, professor of social psychology of the other, unites a skeptical view of the possible threats of our Western democracies. Climate change, resource shortage, pollution of the environment, migration movements due to expected floods and desertifications or the overfishing of the seas have built up a destructive potential that can only be defused by the radical change of our lifestyles. The two discuss controversial questionable instruments such as emissions trading, the ideological system competition of capitalism and socialism and the vulnerability of high technology cultures. It is the ridge-walking between the pointed point finger and future-oriented optimism that makes reading exciting and involves the reader as a actor in this scenario. With detailed commentaries and registers. (2)
content.title_en: The end of the world as we knew it : climate, future and the opportunities of democracy

content.text: Nanotechnology in the food sector. So far, only a few nanoscale food additives or food ingredients with such components are available on the Swiss market. Synthetic nanomaterials are additives such as silicon dioxide, carotenoids and micells, which have been used for many years and are toxicologically tested. They enable improved handling, improved optics or an increase in the bioavailability of nutrients. On the other hand, food supplements with nanoscale precious metals with questionable benefits and partly toxicologically questionable properties are offered on non-European markets. This study shows the chances and risks of the use of synthetic nanomaterials in food and food packaging.
content.title_en: Nanotechnology in the food sector

content.text: The study of the end of life is one of the basic tasks of every religious education. It calls anthropological basic constants - such as death - into the consciousness of the people; this is particularly important in a topic that is otherwise marginalized and tabooized. The study of death and death has now found its way into the teaching boards of all school types and federal states. The aim is to convey a thematic reflective ability and corresponding social and self-competences to young people. The volume offers an analysis of the learning conditions, scientific and didactical information as well as material for the religious instruction of upper secondary education and II and the work in the community on all relevant aspects of the topic.
content.title_en: Talking about Death in Religious Education

content.text: The fall of the Islamic world: a prognosis. The Islamic countries unite a religion from which they derive a problematic human and social image: women and most men who do not come from the ruling class are excluded. Unceasing intellectual resources must not be used, which also means that the prosperity of these states is lost. Fundamentalist Muslims consistently interpret this misery as the result of "the hostile politics of the West". Regional and global perspectives are threatening, because the coming together of an anti-innovation culture, a rapidly growing, poor and oppressed population, the slumping oil reserves and climatic problems results in an explosive mixture. Hamed Abdel-Samad ventures a sharp, compelling prognosis for the future of culture, which he himself comes from: the Islamic states will disintegrate, Islam will be a political and social idea, it will be a culture that will fall
content.title_en: The Fall of the Islamic World : a Forecast

content.text: Human Time: Destroy or shape? ; the decisive epoch of our planet. The renowned science journalist Christian Schwägerl (The Mirror) describes why we live in the "Anthropocene", the age of man, in which we fundamentally change the planet Earth at breathtaking speed. Man creates new landscapes, intervenes in the world climate, emptys the seas, creates new living beings. The boundaries between nature and culture disappear. From the environment becomes a "human world" - but it is characterized by shortsightedness and robbery. Are we developing the maturity to use our power for a long future? The renowned science journalist Christian Schwägerl describes why we have long since been in the Anthropocene, human time living in an era in which man is changing his planet at breathtaking speed. The technologies of the modern era have enabled an explosion of production increase, accompanied by dramatic population growth. Rapid climate change, species extinction and an increasingly fragile ecosystem hang like a damoclessword over the unremitten rise of a species that has changed the earth unremitigably. But we can only live in a future, and in a future is not able to rejoy. We can only live in a future in society, but in society.
content.title_en: Human Time : Destroy or shape? ; the decisive epoch of our planet

content.text: User experience design : with experience-centered software development to products that inspire. User experience design process, design process -- idea, idea-finding -- business analysis -- user research -- requirements -- information architecture -- interaction design, interaction design -- information design -- visual design -- usability testing -- evaluation, method, evaluation methods
content.title_en: User experience design : with experience-centered software development to products that inspire

content.text: Working like never before!? : on the way to collective capacity for action. The organization of work is out of the way. We must move away from the division into alienated industrial work, unrecognized unpaid "female" reproduction work and forced unemployment. This reader is to serve as a basis for discussion and decision-making for the direction of the urgently needed conversion
content.title_en: Working like never before!? : on the way to collective action

content.text: How different are they? : the brain development of girls and boys. The American neurobiologist has already described how the brain development takes place from the moment of conception and what role genetic conditions and external influences play in this process (BA 11/01). Now she finds that gender-specific behavioral differences are often not innate, that the brains of boys and girls are almost identical before and shortly after birth rather and that only the external influences of parents, teachers and social conventions cause striking deviations during the course of development. Eliot reports numerous studies, which support her theses, shows which manifold causes gender differences between girls and boys really have and makes suggestions on how to deal with them. A very differentiated and detailed analysis, which however, also readers without scientific background will be well understandable; at the same time a dedicated, to parents and educators directed pledoyer for a departure from old role patterns and gender conventions. (2) (Reinhold Heckmann) Eliot proves that the brains of boys and girls before and shortly after the same birth and the same pattern of the brains provide for the departure of the outside parents and the brain.
content.title_en: How different are they? : the brain development of girls and boys

content.text: First help for the PC : solve every problem yourself!. New edition of the "First Aid Box", which the renowned author compiled for the first time in 2005 (BA 1/06). Outside there is a familiar picture (a rescue ring also marked the cover of the predecessor, BA 8/08), but again the author - who apparently has an inexhaustible fundus - has changed everything thoroughly compared to the edition of 2008 respectively. Of course everything was modified on Windows 7, also the already detailed "problem finder" at the beginning of the volume shows thorough changes in detail. Although you find some of the problems again (the explanations are however strongly revised), but many have also fallen away or added new. Therefore the same conclusion as last time: the old edition can remain quite true (there are still numerous XP or Vista users), but the new edition of this exemplary, practical and understandablely written guide for many PC emergencies should be added. (2) (Sch) Extensive explanations on problems that can occur when using a PC - A like battery to W.
content.title_en: First aid for the PC : solve every problem yourself!

content.text: Hegel Manual : Life - Work - School. Note Internationale Hölderlin Bibliography: p. 3-10: Tübingen (1788-1793); p. 10-15: Bern (1793-1796); p. 15-17: Frankfurt (1797-1800); p. 75f.: Eleusis. An Hölderlin (August 1796); p. 76-80: The oldest system program of German idealism
content.title_en: Hegel Manual : Life - Work - School

content.text: Questions of use and regulation of the Internet are now posed in each and every area of society. Legal users and the right itself are therefore also required to provide answers to these questions or at least to point out a way to their answers. Therefore, based on selected individual aspects, the authors of the volume try to answer all former or current doctoral students at the University of Leipzig's Faculty of Law, civil, criminal and public law questions of use and regulation of the Internet and thereby make the legal encroachment of the supposedly "free space" internet visible. (Source: Text Verlagseinband / Verlag)
content.title_en: Legal issues concerning the use and regulation of the Internet

content.text: Transport cost management in road freight transport: basics, optimization potentials, green logistics. Verl.Beschr.: This book offers a comprehensive and application-oriented presentation of the road freight market. The focus is on the analysis of the actors, products and cost structures, supplemented by numerous current best practice case studies. For example, the possibilities and limits of a shift of truck traffic to the rail are clearly illustrated in the topic of green logistics. An ideal reference work for logistics service providers and buyers
content.title_en: Transport cost management in road freight transport : basics, optimization potentials, Green Logistics

content.text: Sports in prevention : Guide for instructors, sports teachers, physiotherapists and trainers : with 113 illustrations in 261 individual presentations and 91 tables. The book provides the practical and theoretical foundations for training, professional practice and sports practice on the topic of "preventive sports offers".
content.title_en: Sports in prevention : Manual for instructors, sports instructors, physiotherapists and trainers : with 113 figures in 261 individual presentations and 91 tables

content.text: The ground and components near the surface in the foundation area can be used for heating and cooling office buildings. The title presents systems such as energy pile, geothermal probe and foundation absorber for planners, builders and craftsmen. From the content: System overview Planning, standards and approval questions Energy and operational monitoring Experiences from realized projects Economic aspects
content.title_en: Use geothermal energy for office buildings

content.text: No panic over statistics! : Success and fun in the horror subject of nontechnical courses of study. Publisher's text: A Statistics book expressly for non-mathematicians and in unconventional ways of presentation. Statistics is feared as a mathematical discipline in many courses of study. In technical but also non-technical subjects, such as social sciences, political science, psychology, etc., statistics as an important tool represents an unpleasant hurdle for the students interested in other things. Spicy with humor and cartoons can be found for many an entertaining and carefree access to statistics and a bridge to the more serious and theoretical textbooks.
content.title_en: Don't panic about statistics! : Success and fun in the horror subject of nontechnical study programmes

content.text: Master course IT controlling : Basics and practice for IT controllers and CIOs - Balanced Scorecard - Portfolio Management - Value contribution of IT - Project controlling - Key figures - IT-sourcing - IT-cost and performance calculation. Review: Since the first edition of 2004, this work has been the first textbook to come up with a closed IT controlling concept. This benefits both teaching and corporate practice. The work is now considered the standard plant par excellence and is strongly recommended in universities and seminars as a practical basis. Further practice exercises and an exercise clause offer in particular a validation of the learning success of the students. IT controlling means service. As a contribution to the management level of the company, it supports the management of the enterprise by means of the management of the enterprise through the acquisition and job securing. Further practice tasks and an exercise clause are explained by the student's study practice statement. The fourth edition is about IT-sourcing, IT-asset management, software for IT controllers and Green IT as well as several case studies and practical examples. The statements on project controlling have been significantly extended.
content.title_en: Master course IT controlling : Basics and practice for IT controllers and CIOs - Balanced Scorecard - Portfolio management - Value contribution of IT - Project controlling - Key figures - IT-sourcing - IT-Cost- and Performance Accounting

content.text: Mathematics for industrial engineers and science and technology courses of study : Volume 2: Analysis in IRn, Linear algebra, Hilberträume, Fourieranalyse, Differential equations, stochastics. An integrated introduction to mathematics, which rises from concrete to general, dispenses with drawers such as 'Lineare algebra' and 'analysis' and which contains (almost) all the evidence. As readers, students of industrial engineering and other science and technology courses of study as well as students of economic mathematics and computer science are particularly eligible. Students of new degree programmes such as Bachelor in mathematics and even of the classical diploma course of mathematics will also read the book with profit. The presentation is exact, but less abstract.
content.title_en: Mathematics for Industrial Engineers and Science and Technology Studies : Volume 2: Analysis in the IRn, Linear algebra, Hilberträume, Fourieranalyse, Differential equations, Stochastics

content.text: The new antenna guide : Receive antennas for all wave ranges: external, indoor, temporary and active antennas. Continued the last "antenna guide" displayed in 6th edition of the same author (BA 4/05). Provides a current overview of different antenna designs for radio and radio reception according to the technical principles of radio technology. Also offers construction instructions and circuit diagrams. Has been streamlined and continuously updated compared to the previous one, previous editions (still under W. Siebel) should be deleted everywhere. (2)
content.title_en: The new antenna guide : Receive antennas for all shaft areas: outdoor, indoor, temporary and active antennas

content.text: The public interest in the debate on the reconstruction of monuments could be diminished after conservative politicians, speakers of conservative pressure groups and tourism managers seem to have managed to marginalize them as idle principle dispute among monument keepers. Why, could the reconstruction lobby ask, could a debate continue, after it seems to have been widely agreed that the reconstruction of abandoned building substance is simply a matter of course? - - The publication, which appears in the series Bauwelt Grundlagen against the reconstruction of monuments, opposes the mainstream in contentious intention. As a plea against the simulation of historical building substance, it wants to revive the reconstruction debate in the Federal Republic in content.
content.title_en: Monument conservation instead of decoy cult : against the reconstruction of monuments - an anthology

content.text: Elements of theoretical physics : Volume 1: Classical mechanics and special relativity theory An introduction to the teaching and bachelor's degree programme. The book provides the basics and most important concepts of theoretical mechanics and special relativity theory, as far as they are required in teaching and bachelor's degree programmes. This is not a presentation, as defined in the Master's or the previous degree programme, 'as comprehensive as possible', but a presentation of the theoretical pillars of modern physics, which was kept slim compared to other textbooks on theoretical physics.
content.title_en: Elements of theoretical physics : Volume 1: Classical mechanics and special theory of relativity An introduction to the teaching and bachelor's degree programme

content.text: Africa before the big jump. A kind of "positive strife" that wants to clear up the clichés of the "continent of crisis" and in return tries to highlight the potential of Africa - not only in economic terms -
content.title_en: Africa before the Great Jump

content.text: Video : cutting, upgrading and enjoying in the home cinema. The titles of the series "Digital Lifeguide" by Hanser-Verlag have so far provided competent and precise, but concise and unscrupulous information on the various sub-areas of a topic - and the title here makes no exception. Consideration is given to a successful selection of topics from the field "Digital Video" (technology of digital recording and playback devices, file formats and codecs, areas of application of various video applications, editing, storing and publishing processed videos), which are well geared to the needs of the target group "Consumer" in terms of their professional depth. The explanations are well understandable, the examples practical, also performance and price of the recommended soft and hardware products fit the target group. Good: To each chapter numerous internet sources are mentioned, which refer to further websites. Conclusion: Description of an interesting selection of individual topics of the area Digital Video, consistently geared to the skills and needs of the demanding home user. (1)
content.title_en: Video : cut, upgrade and enjoy in the home cinema

content.text: Organized : Dates, contacts, tasks always & everywhere in the grip. The new, inexpensive guide series on the digital everyday life "Digital lifeguide" (T. Schirmer: "Mobile life", ID 19/11; Ron Faber: "Games", ID 1/11 - Manfred Schwarz: "Home Media", BA 12/10 etc.) offers easy-to-understand, stimulating and useful information about everything that is now possible with digital devices in everyday life and leisure time. This edition is dedicated to the different possibilities of self-organization. With which program or with which means of Windows and Mac you can keep tasks, appointments, emails and other more in control. Efficiently organizes everyday life, that goes with computers and smartphones, with Outlook or OneNote as well as Google and other free tools. A concise, but clear and understandable book, which introduces competently and target group-oriented into the most important aspects of the topic more than just. Many good tips, hints and download addresses. For beginners a worthwhile and inexpensive entry into the topic. Uncompetitive, inexpensive, quick, concise, and flush (1).
content.title_en: Organized : Dates, contacts, tasks always & everywhere under control

content.text: Lexicon of Informatics. "The dictionary of computer science provides the necessary security in dealing with the world of concepts of information technology. The lexicon - which covers computer science representatively and currently - offers over 6000 short definitions under more than 5500 keywords - does not claim to present theories - is linguistically very dense and concise - supports cross-references the conceptual networking - places importance on linguistics, gives indications of the origin of words and adheres to a language concept, e.g. regarding anglizisms - avoids far-reaching the mention of products and short-lived characteristics - is not obliged to any manufacturer and no computer science "religion" - maintains sober distance and does not shy away from the critical note - stands me discreet humor against obscurities in IT. The focus of the revision to the 15th edition was on the areas of BI and Java technologies. Furthermore, the whole content was linguistically revised and adapted."
content.title_en: Lexicon of Computer Science

content.text: Computers and the Internet conquer childhood: from normal play behavior to addiction and its treatment. Two paediatricians and psychiators provide basic information on the current data base and on this slide help to meaningful and unhappiness-free use of children/young people with modern media, especially computers and the Internet. The majority of the book takes up findings and research results, which are well prepared with the help of tables and graphics: on media consumption of children/young people in leisure time; on the effects of the new media on behaviour, (school) performance and health; on the dangers of abuse, keyword: cybermobbing; on the connection of violent computer games and behavior; on pathological computer games and internet use (including addiction forms) and their effects on the psyche. At the end only consulting and therapy offers for affected persons and their relatives. With rich material attachment, literature and register
content.title_en: Computers and Internet conquer childhood: from normal play behavior to addiction and its treatment

content.text: Basic course on statistics in the social sciences : an easy to understand, application-oriented introduction to the necessary statistical knowledge. Publisher's text: The book is intended for social scientists who want to gain the basic knowledge necessary for them in a course of the scope of a semester. It conveys to its readers "statistical literacy" so that they can read output tables from statistical programs, classify statistical statements in scientific publications, statistically criticise opinion surveys and describe their own datasets with the basic statistical methods. It works with little mathematics, many graphics and original output of the statistics program SPSS
content.title_en: Basic course on statistics in the social sciences : an easy to understand, application-oriented introduction to the necessary statistical knowledge for social science

content.text: Probability and closing statistics : Practical introduction ; With tasks and solutions. This introductory textbook shows the entire path from the elementary determination of probabilities to the creation of theoretical probability distributions. It also explains in detail the process of statistical closing, starting from the sample selection to the sample evaluation to the parameter estimation and hypothesis testing. The focus is on the application and practical implementation of statistical methods. The author places particular emphasis on a clear, understandable and comprehensible description. To this end, all methods are presented in a clearly structured form, step by step and in detail. Exercise tasks and control questions on all chapters deepen the material. For all computational tasks to be solved a detailed solution is specified. The book is aimed at students and lecturers of the economics in basic studies at universities and universities as well as practitioners in companies dealing with statistical questions. Professor Dr. Günther Bourier teaches statistics and logistics at the University of Applied Sciences Regensburg.
content.title_en: Probability and closing statistics : practical introduction ; with tasks and solutions

content.text: IT Risk Management with System: From the basics to implementation - A practice-oriented guide. "The practical guide for IT Risk Management in the company is industry-neutral and adapted to the current situation of standardization, IT governance and the current frameworks (e.g. CobiT). The risks relating to information, IT systems and IT services are systematically addressed. The reader receives everything that is necessary to analyse and manage these risks methodically to be able to implement them safely in practice. An exemplary risk management process shows how IT risks are included in the management processes of the company together with other important risks. In this way, the business continuity and emergency management based on today's standards (e.g. BS 25999-x) is fully taken into account. In this edition, compliance topics from the perspective of risk management such as Basel II, SOX and Swiss mandatory law are updated.
content.title_en: IT Risk Management with System : From Basics to Realization - A Practice-Oriented Guide

content.text: Post-Oil City: the city of tomorrow. "Post-Oil City", the first volume of the series of political ecology in a new format, brings us closer to the city of tomorrow. Already, half of the earth's population lives in urban agglomerations - the future of humanity decides in the city. Like a combustion glass, the difficulties facing us in terms of climate change and the declining oil and other resources are bundled here. But cities are also potential spaces of the future; social, economic and ecological experiments are already taking place here, which consciously face these challenges.
content.title_en: Post-Oil City : the city of tomorrow

content.text: Questionnaire : a workbook. This book is a "practice book" in the truest sense of the word. It is intended to help researchers who want to use social science surveys in their empirical research. It is intended to provide help in the development of their questionnaires, in concrete and detailed terms. The book simulates questionnaire consultation, as the author has done for many years at the Center for Surveys, Methods and Analysis (ZUMA) in Mannheim, very practical and written in such a way that readers can work with it when developing a questionnaire, with many examples of how to do something wrong and how to do it right. After a short introduction to the cognitive psychology and communicative foundations of the survey, a variety of methodological aspects of a questionnaire are worked out, from types of questions, types of scales and the formulation of questionnaire questions to a good cover page, to survey aids and to the layout of questionnaires, all illustrated by examples from the survey practice.
content.title_en: Questionnaire : A workbook

content.text: 3D CAD with Inventor 2011 : Tutorial with a continuous project example. Publisher's text: This tutorial describes the creation of a complete project vice in a very vivid and step by step way. This allows us to understand the course of action at any time. In addition to pure 3D modeling, the design of presentations and animations is also presented and thus a holistic approach is realized. The book is addressed to all beginners who want to learn working safely with this 3D CAD system.
content.title_en: 3D CAD with Inventor 2011 : tutorial with a continuous project example

content.text: If we were animals: novel. At the center of the new novel by the Büchner Prize winner of 2004 is a freelance architect around the 40th, who, both professionally and privately, opens up new opportunities through the death of a friend - but then fails in a very unusual way. (Ronald Schneider) Life in the modern world demands too much: daily presence in the workplace, including commitment and friendly face, the use of transport and the visit of supermarkets. And then also the private life. Inescapably comes the moment when a man no longer knows - and before you know it, it is instead of one even three women. Oh, if we were animals and could simply overlook the daily noises! Wilhelm Genazino tells ironically, funny and evil of a man who can only endure everyday life by breaking the orderly rules.
content.title_en: If we were animals : Roman

content.text: The book successfully implements strategies in the company: Overcoming barriers and actively acting. Practically tested and compactly, the book offers case-specific tools and opens up new ways to implement strategies. Sandra Müller and Stephanie Semsey are independent management consultants with long-standing practical experience, including in large corporations. They advise companies on the topics of leadership, customer communication, CRM and change management. "Companies spend considerable sums on developing new strategies. However, many of the promising new approaches fail in the implementation phase. Where is it actually? How can the barriers in strategy implementation be effectively removed and new options for action be opened up. In this compact guide for strategy projects, the authors show by means of tangible processes from the management everyday life how to protect projects from the six typical dangers when implementing them. Through practical cases, checklists and self-tests you learn to adjust your own compass and secure business success with focus on the company's employees. A useful guide for "alt rabbits" who consciously reflect on their own experience, as well as they would like to prepare themselves for future professional projects.
content.title_en: Successful implementation of strategies in the company: overcoming barriers and acting actively
